display_html: data Of a b = !a :> b
name: Of :>

display_html:
data Stream f m r
  • = Step !(f (Stream f m r))
  • | Effect (m (Stream f m r))
  • | Return r
name: Stream Step Effect Return

display_html: unfold :: (Monad m, Functor f) => (s -> m (Either r (f s))) -> s -> Stream f m r
name: unfold

name: replicates

name: repeats

name: repeatsM

name: effect

display_html: wrap :: (Monad m, Functor f) => f (Stream f m r) -> Stream f m r
name: wrap

display_html: yields :: (Monad m, Functor f) => f r -> Stream f m r
name: yields

display_html: streamBuild :: (forall b. (r -> b) -> (m b -> b) -> (f b -> b) -> b) -> Stream f m r
name: streamBuild

name: cycles

name: delays

name: never

name: untilJust

name: intercalates

name: concats

name: iterT

name: iterTM

name: destroy

name: streamFold

name: mapsMPost

name: mapsM

name: mappedPost

name: hoistUnexposed

name: distribute

name: chunksOf

name: concats

name: intercalates

name: cutoff

name: zipsWith

name: zipsWith'

name: unzips

name: unseparate

name: decompose

name: expand

name: expandPost

name: streamFold

name: Of :>

name: strictly

display_html:
class MFunctor (t :: (Type -> Type) -> k -> Type) where
  • hoist :: forall m n (b :: k). Monad m => (forall a. m a -> n a) -> t m b -> t n b
name: MFunctor hoist

display_html:
class (MFunctor t, MonadTrans t) => MMonad (t :: (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type) where
  • embed :: forall (n :: Type -> Type) m b. Monad n => (forall a. m a -> t n a) -> t m b -> t n b
name: MMonad embed

display_html:
class (forall (m :: Type -> Type). Monad m => Monad (t m)) => MonadTrans (t :: (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type) where
  • lift :: Monad m => m a -> t m a
name: MonadTrans lift

display_html:
class Monad m => MonadIO (m :: Type -> Type) where
  • liftIO :: IO a -> m a
name: MonadIO liftIO

display_html:
newtype Compose (f :: k -> Type) (g :: k1 -> k) (a :: k1) = Compose {
  • getCompose :: f (g a)
}
name: Compose Compose getCompose

display_html:
data Sum (f :: k -> Type) (g :: k -> Type) (a :: k)
  • = InL (f a)
  • | InR (g a)
name: Sum InL InR

display_html:
newtype Identity a = Identity {
  • runIdentity :: a
}
name: Identity Identity runIdentity

display_html:
class Applicative f => Alternative (f :: Type -> Type) where
  • (<|>) :: f a -> f a -> f a
name: Alternative <|>

display_html:
class (forall a. Functor (p a)) => Bifunctor (p :: Type -> Type -> Type) where
  • bimap :: (a -> b) -> (c -> d) -> p a c -> p b d
  • first :: (a -> b) -> p a c -> p b c
  • second :: (b -> c) -> p a b -> p a c
name: Bifunctor bimap first second

display_html: join :: Monad m => m (m a) -> m a
name: join

display_html: liftM :: Monad m => (a1 -> r) -> m a1 -> m r
name: liftM

display_html: liftM2 :: Monad m => (a1 -> a2 -> r) -> m a1 -> m a2 -> m r
name: liftM2

display_html: liftA2 :: Applicative f => (a -> b -> c) -> f a -> f b -> f c
name: liftA2

display_html: liftA3 :: Applicative f => (a -> b -> c -> d) -> f a -> f b -> f c -> f d
name: liftA3

display_html: void :: Functor f => f a -> f ()
name: void

display_html: (<>) :: Semigroup a => a -> a -> a
